title: Money lessons you don't learn in school.
description: In the game you will learn basic and advanced strategies on how to create passive income and manage your personal finances

title: Rich people don't work for money, the make the money work for them
description: In order to become rich you must know the difference between assets and liabilities. Hint: The assets put money in your pocket, liabilities take them out.

title: Let the game begin!
description: In your first challenge, you will learn why it is so important to pay yourself first. If you do not know what this means, then this game is right for you.
